author: Drew Harwell
title: Trump’s Truth Social’s disastrous launch raises doubts about its long-term viability
description: “The basic thing they needed to actually get right to get someone in the door, they couldn’t get right,” one researcher said.
content: Even Trump supporters made jokes about the early slog. Jenna Ellis, a former member of his legal team, posted to Instagram a photo showing Trump with his finger hovering over a laptop, letting us on … [+7973 chars]
